sentences:
The participation of Galicia Spain in World War II was marked by its location in front of behind the back of the Atlantic .
The World War II was a conflict armed to global level that lasted since 1939 at 1945 .
In spite of the Spanish neutrality , the war also affected the country due to his strategic location .
The tungsten excractes of mines as the Mines of San Fins was used for the nazi bellicose industry .
The extraction and transport of the mineral carried out it lid companies , as the Finance and Industrial Corporation ( Galician : Sociedade Financeira e Industrial ) .
Hundreds of Galicians traveled to fight with the Germans in the Eastern Front , in the Blue Division , on another side , former republican combatants fought with the allies , many of them being confined in fields of concentration .
